lead_paragraph: ABRAMSON--Richard S. American Friends of The Hebrew University (AFHU) and The Hebrew University of Jerusalem are saddened by the passing of our friend and colleague, Richard Abramson. Richard was a leader in the financial services industry and a humanitarian who was dedicated to Israel, the Jewish community and the cause of higher education. Richard served on AFHU's national board and its Investment Committee, helping to foster pioneering academic and research pursuits. We extend our deepest sympathies to his wife Lorraine and the entire family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. The Hebrew University of Jerusalem Professor Menahem Ben-Sasson, President American Friends of The Hebrew University Michael S. Kurtz, Chairman Daniel I. Schlessinger, President Beth Asnien McCoy, National Executive Director 1/3
